import React from 'react'; import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; const BasketProduct = ({ onRemoveCart }) => { const { basketItems } = useSelector(state => state.basket) return (
.baskt {basketItems && basketItems.map((item) => (

{item.title}

{item.price} руб.

) )}
Итого:
21 498 руб.
Налог 5%:
1074 руб.
) } export default BasketProduct;
